114  template<typename T>
115  plDistributionTable (const plVariablesConjunction& left,
116  const plVariablesConjunction& right,
117  const std::vector <T> &table,
118  bool already_normalized = false)
119  : plCndDistribution(left, right, PLDistributionTable)
120  {
121  initialize(left, right, right, false);
122 
123  unsigned int the_size = table.size();
124  plProbValue *p_table = new plProbValue[the_size];
125  for(unsigned int i=0; i<the_size; i++) {
126  p_table[i] = table[i];
127  }
128  fill_using_table(p_table, already_normalized);
129 
130  delete [] p_table;
131  }
132 
141  plDistributionTable(const plVariablesConjunction& left,
142  const plVariablesConjunction& right,
143  plProbValue (*f) (const plValues &left_values,
144  const plValues& right_values),
145  bool already_normalized = false);
146 
155  template<typename T>
156  plDistributionTable(const plVariablesConjunction& left,
157  const plVariablesConjunction& right,
158  T *obj,
159  plProbValue (T::*method) (const plValues &left_values,
160  const plValues& right_values),
161  bool already_normalized = false)
162  : plCndDistribution(left, right, PLDistributionTable)
163  {
164  initialize(left, right, right, false);
165 
166  // XXX this code is duplicated from fill_using_function
167  // but I don't know how to fix it -- Ronan (it works fine though)
168 
169  plValues v_left(get_left_variables());
170  plValues v_right(get_right_variables());
171 
172  std::vector<plProbValue> column_values;
173 
174  do {
175  column_values.clear();
176 
177  v_left.reset();
178  do {
179  column_values.push_back((obj->*method)(v_left, v_right));
180  } while (v_left.next());
181 
182  plProbTable column(left, column_values, already_normalized);
183 
184  push(column, v_right);
185 
186  } while (v_right.next());
187  }
188
